text: 7.5: Stt 12.7; 13.15; 15.3; 15.18; 17.8; 26.3; 48.4; Lo 2.5Abraham mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme ara heav nuiana sɨga thuen ana ndɨɨv, khaŋ ana suaŋgi fhuvara. Khe ndun nuiana sɨgeŋ ma, ndun tari zumgum ne ganɨnga, ana maaŋ ana suaŋgi fhuvara. Fhe Bakɨme guigira khaŋ ana suaŋgi, ana zumgum mba nuianan ana nɨɨŋgirim, ana won tari gum nzɨgir kov, mba nuianeŋ ganɨnga. Mba tugen vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme mba kamen Abraham ga suaŋgim, Abraham, ana mba tugen, ana tara the tegi fhu, ana fhura ki.
